boardgame.name: Court of the Medici
boardgame.description: Court of the Medici is a casual card game of politics and intrigue at the Medici court. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; In Court of the Medici, you play the leader of one of the powerful factions in the city of Florence. Your faction_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s power and prosperity in Florence are tied to your favor with the city_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s ruling family, the Medici. Favor with the Grand Duke de Medici comes from having the nobles of your faction present at court. However, with nobles from all the other factions at court as well, your influence on the duke is limited. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Through wisely using the nobles you send to court though, you may be able to reduce your rival_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s influence while increasing your own faction_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s prestige._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;-from publisher_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Court of the Medici FAQ_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2010 Golden Geek Best Abstract Board Game Nominee
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: BGB Volume 83 - Homesteaders, Long Shot and Court of the Medici - plus a note about Kevin Pimental

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Game is new and in shrink. Payment possible via Paypal or Bank transfer. Shipping within Germany: 4,50 Euro. We ship only to EU-countries (insured and with online tracking)! Shipping costs are: * 12,50 Euro * 10,- Euro if you order games for 100,- Euro or more Thank you for your interest and please take a look at our online-shop at www.cosimshop.de !
Complete and in great shape. Payment via non-credit/debit card PayPal, or USPS money order. Shipping is $4. Combine shipping on multiple games.

Z-Man Games (ZMG 4051) Designed by Richard James Welcome to the court of Cosimo I de_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; Medici, where House Gonzaga and House Della Rovere compete for the friendship of the Grand Duke of Tuscany. As leader of your house, you must dispatch nobles to the Court of the Medici to curry favor with the Grand Duke if you hope to win his support. By directing your nobles to form alliances and esecute conspiracies, you can build up influence at court and eliminate those nobles belonging to your rival.

Z-Man Games (ZMG 4051) Designed by Richard James Welcome to the court of Cosimo I de_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; Medici, where House Gonzaga and House Della Rovere compete for the friendship of the Grand Duke of Tuscany. As leader of your house, you must dispatch nobles to the Court of the Medici to curry favor with the Grand Duke if you hope to win his support. By directing your nobles to form alliances and esecute conspiracies, you can build up influence at court and eliminate those nobles belonging to your rival.

New in Shrink. £1.50 postage to UK. I will ship worldwide (please ask, if outside the UK, for a shipping quote before ordering), combine orders for cheaper postage and will give a discount for purchases over £50. Please contact me for details. All items (over 500 unique games) I list are in stock and will be posted within 24 working hours of payment being received.

Shrinkwrap removed but otherwise perfect. I store my games in a pet-free and smoke-free environment and I package my games for shipment with the utmost care. I ship quickly - within 24 hours of receiving payment. I have many hundreds of games for sale and would be happy to combine shipping charges for multiple games to save you money. Shipping weight is 3 pounds.

Size: Bubble Mailer Standard Information listed on all my For Sale Games: ------------------------------------------------------ 1) Shipping cost is the highest cost of all games purchased + the add on cost of each other game. Promo cards or anything else that fits in a bubble mailer will have a base cost of $5 and and an add on cost of $1, a small game has a base cost of $8 and an add on cost of $2, a medium game has a base cost of $14 and an add on cost of $3 and a large game has a base cost of $20 and add on cost of $4. Anything outside that range will be listed specifically. If you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re providing a business address to ship to, take a $1 off the shipping. 2) Purchase a $100 or more worth of games and get 5% off your total order. 3) Purchase $200 or more and get 5% off and free shipping. 4) If you see any games on my for trade list that aren_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t up for sale, feel free to ask me to add to the market. 5) Most conditions are listed as very good, all those items listed as such range from very good to like new. 6) Amazon and game store gift cards are usually accepted but please check with me first if that_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s an option you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d like to pursue. 7) I try to list editions but if an edition isn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t listed and it matters to you, please ask! If an item is bought and another edition was expected but you didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t ask, then I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m happy to refund but I can_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t cover either shipping charge.
